page.title: 13Shopping patterns
page.content: We asked at home about where most of the shopping is done.This was divided into 4 types of shopping; 1.The weekly or monthly groceries 2.Clothes,shoes,toys etc 3.Large items eg.furniture,T.V.,car 4.Casual shopping Most of the weekly shopping was done in one of the nearby towns where there are supermarkets and cash and carry facilities.Things in the second section came from the same nearby towns and also largely from the city of Plymouth 20 miles away.The pattern for the third section was the most varied with Plymouth taking the most. Local garages did well for cars and two nearby discount stores near Liskeard did well for furniture.Coads Green Sub Post Office and shop was only used for odd items that had been forgotten because it was too dear.
